body:
This post doesn't have to do anything with my giveaway ro so, i need help...

When i go to optifine after that i changed my IGN to restore my cape to that IGN im only able to log in, i mean, i can click Log In and log in easily.
But when i click "Cape" i have to log in too as always but i cant log in there, it says:

"If your Username/Password is not accepted you can try reset it here"

help please, i've been trying on and on, i've changed my password, like everything and i still cant get in there!!!
body_tagged:
This post doesn't have to do anything with my giveaway ro so, i need help...

When i go to optifine after that i changed my IGN to restore my cape to that IGN im only able to log in, i mean, i can click Log In and log in easily.
But when i click "Cape" i have to log in too as always but i cant log in there, it says:

"If your Username/Password is not accepted you can try reset it here"

help please, i've been trying on and on, i've changed my password, like everything and i still cant get in there!!!
title: Optifine Cape Help

replies.body:
Same happend with me while I tried to log in from mobile. I fixed it with going on comp where the pass is already saved, but DONT press "cape". Go to "login" , and then go to "cape" (after you have logged in).
This worked for me, and I hope it works for you :)
replies.body_tagged:
Same happend with me while I tried to log in from mobile. I fixed it with going on comp where the pass is already saved, but DONT press "cape". Go to "login" , and then go to "cape" (after you have logged in).
This worked for me, and I hope it works for you :)

replies.body: but i cant change the cape through there

replies.body: If you're already logged in then why would you need to log it again?
replies.body_tagged: If you're already logged in then why would you need to log it again?

replies.body: because there isn't a remember me option
replies.body_tagged: because there isn't a remember me option
